subject: Problem encountered while running EcommerceTestSuite
msgSnippet: Hi, When I want to run EcommerceTestSuite given on the webpage of JUnit Primer ( http://clarkware.com/articles/JUnitPrimer.html) , I am ecountering some
messageBody:
Hi,

When I want to run EcommerceTestSuite given on the webpage of "JUnit
Primer" ( http://clarkware.com/articles/JUnitPrimer.html) , I am
ecountering some problem:

I am getting
Error: java.lang.ClassCastException: class EcommerceTestSuite

I am simply following the instructions given on the page.

Can anybody tell me if he/she got similar error while running this
exmaple. Or where I could be going wrong. I am using jdk 1.5. I have
downloaded the examples; compiled them and am trying to run them.

In fact I am getting this error while sunning the simplest TestSuite:

import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestSuite;

public class EcommerceTestSuite {

public static TestSuite suite() {

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite(" ABC TESTS ");
return suite;
}

/**
* Runs the test suite using the textual runner.
*/
public static void main(String[] args) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}
}

When I run

java -classpath ./junit-4.3.1.jar;. junit.textui.TestRunner
EcommerceTestSuite

Error: java.lang.ClassCastException: class EcommerceTestSuite





Regards

Vivek
